syscalls.c File Reference

This file contains a collection of stub functions to replace those used by the C library newlib. Primarily, it provides functionality to redirect standard I/O. More...

#include "config.h"
#include <errno.h>
#include <unistd.h>

Detailed Description

This file contains a collection of stub functions to replace those used by the C library newlib. Primarily, it provides functionality to redirect standard I/O.

Author:
Michael Hayes
Date:
18 February 2008
